channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The fight to beat neglected tropical diseases was going well. 2025 could change that
item.description: The campaign to prevent and treat these diseases has seen great success thanks to a USAID program. Now that program is gone.

item.title: Greetings from Andhra Pradesh, India, where a fragrant food stand feeds working women
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Machado's daughter accepts Nobel Peace Prize in Venezuelan opposition leader's absence
item.description: Machado — who has been in hiding for nearly a year — was still expected in Oslo later in the day.

item.title: Author Sophie Kinsella, who penned the 'Shopaholic' books, has died at 55
item.description: The author, whose real name was Madeleine Sophie Wickham, was diagnosed with an aggressive form of brain cancer in late 2022.

item.title: The Fed is expected to cut rates. And, Afghan CIA fighters feel abandoned by the U.S.
item.description: The divided Federal Reserve is considering cutting interest rates today. And, Afghans in the U.S. who fought for the CIA say they feel abandoned by th...

item.title: US sanctions network it says recruits Colombian fighters for Sudan civil war
item.description: The US Treasury said the network of four entities and four individuals is primarily Colombian.

item.title: Ukraine 'ready for elections' if partners guarantee security, Zelensky says
item.description: He was speaking after US President Donald Trump repeated claims Kyiv was "using war" to avoid elections.

item.title: Rebels reportedly enter key DR Congo city despite Trump peace deal
item.description: Terrified residents say heavy artillery and gunfire has hit Uvira, the gateway to Burundi.

item.title: Read María Corina Machado's Nobel Prize speech, given by her daughter
item.description: The daughter of María Corina Machado​ gave a speech in Oslo on Wednesday on behalf of her mother, who was awarded the 2025 Nobel Peace Prize.

item.title: Trump’s crackdown on immigration is taking a toll on child care workers
item.description: President Donald Trump’s push for the largest mass deportation in history has had an outsized impact on the child care field, which is heavily reliant...

item.title: Eileen Higgins wins Miami mayoral runoff, breaking 30-year Democratic drought
item.description: Higgins defeated former city manager Emilio Gonzalez with 59% of the vote, pledging to tackle housing affordability, climate resilience, and restore t...

item.title: House to vote today on must-pass $900 billion defense policy bill
item.description: The House is poised to vote Wednesday on a $900 billion defense policy bill as both chambers race to pass it before the end of the year.

item.title: Judge rules Epstein grand jury records from 2019 case can be released
item.description: A federal judge says materials from the investigation can be unsealed because of a new law passed by Congress last month.

item.title: Trump celebrates his economic policies: "America is winning again"
item.description: President Trump visited Pennsylvania to discuss his economic policies, which he says have benefited Americans despite affordability concerns. CBS News...

item.title: US judge blocks Trump's National Guard deployment in Los Angeles
item.description: The judge has ordered control of the the troops, which were deployed in June, to be returned to California's governor.

item.title: 5 arrested in crypto heist after man murdered, woman kidnapped
item.description: The woman was freed at midnight and reported the abduction. Police later found her partner's body in a wooded area.

item.title: Pacific Northwest braces for more heavy rain, after powerful storm caused flooding, rescues
Opponents of Trump-backed redistricting in Missouri submit a petition to force a public vote
